About Me

Who am I...

BIO

I am an eleventh grade high school student interested in the fields of business, economics, and computer science. I created this website using HTML, CSS, SASS, Javascript, and PHP.

Triangle Ecycling

Intern (2018-2019)

As an intern at Triangle Ecycling I learned about computer hardware, enviornmental issues surrounding e-waste, and sustainable business models. Throughout the year I helped refurbish hundreds of computers. I even built my own desktop through the program.

FBLA

Member (2016-2019) Treasurer (2017-2018) Vice President (2018-2019)

As a member of my schools FBLA chapter I have held leadership positions such as treasurer and vice president. Additionally, I have competed in Graphic Design and Financial Math. I won 1st and 4th place in the state respectively.

Boy Scouts Troop 39

Eagle Scout

During my time with the troop I have served many leadership positions including Patrol Leader and Assistant Senior Patrol Leader. After learning many leadership and outdoor survival skills, I earned my Eagle Scout in 2018. For my Eagle Project I built two fiberglass bridges.
